column4: using ubuntu 10.04 it says i am usign 623gb in my home folde rusing df -h yet when i right click my home folder it has 64gb inside it help
df -h must be showing ur home partition... you must have more than ur own home folder in the partition
I know for a fact i dont have 624gb worth of files
could u use paste.ubuntu.com and paste results of "df -hl"
